C

ClientFacade - Interface in facades
This general interface (which enables polymorphism) is being used in the login method of the coupon system singleton
ClientType - Enum in beans
This Enum is being used for the login method in the coupon system singleton, and contain the strings ADMIN, COMPANY or CUSTOMER
closeAllConnections() - Method in class connectionPool.ConnectionPool
This method closes all the open connections by removing them from the set collections
closing - Variable in class connectionPool.ConnectionPool
 
Company - Class in beans
This class generates the company object, which has id, name, password & email
Company() - Constructor for class beans.Company
Empty company CTOR
Company(long, String, String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Company
This CTOR sets the company class fields - including the id field - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
Company(String, String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Company
This CTOR sets the company class fields - not including the id field, that is been automatically generated in the db - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
CompanyDAO - Interface in dao
This is an interface of The system company DAO (Data Access Objects) layer, which contains basic CRUD methods
CompanyDaoDb - Class in dao.db
This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).
CompanyDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
 
CompanyFacade - Class in facades
With the company facade - the layer for the business logic - the company can create, remove and perform various actions relating to its details & coupons.
CompanyFacade() - Constructor for class facades.CompanyFacade
This CTOR instantiates the company, customer & coupon DaoDb layer, in order to allow access to its methods
CompanyFilter - Class in webServices.accessFilters
This filter handles a scenario when a user is trying to access the company page, without login and receiving of a company facade
CompanyFilter() - Constructor for class webServices.accessFilters.CompanyFilter
 
companyLoggingFilter() - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.FilterUrlConfig
Configures the company filter for specific URL
CompanyWebService - Class in webServices
The company web service handles the HTTP requests sent from the company web page (client side)
CompanyWebService() - Constructor for class webServices.CompanyWebService
 
connectionPool - package connectionPool
 
ConnectionPool - Class in connectionPool
This class is a singleton with a constant number of connections that stored in a Set collection
contextLoads() - Method in class webServices.AlonCouponSystemApplicationTests
 
Coupon - Class in beans
This class generates the coupon object, which has id, title, start date, end (expiration) date, amount (of coupons left), coupon type, message (coupon details), price and an image of the coupon.
Coupon() - Constructor for class beans.Coupon
Empty coupon CTOR
Coupon(long, String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Constructor for class beans.Coupon
This CTOR sets the coupon class fields - including the id field - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
Coupon(String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Constructor for class beans.Coupon
This CTOR sets the coupon class fields - not including the id field, that is been automatically generated in the db - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
CouponDAO - Interface in dao
This is an interface of The system coupon DAO (Data Access Objects) layer, which contains basic CRUD methods
CouponDaoDb - Class in dao.db
This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).
CouponDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
 
CouponSystem - Class in singleton
The CouponSystem class is a singleton that allows access to the rest of the system (by loging in and returning facade to the user), shuts down the system (closes all connections) and activates the cleaner thread (that remove all the expired coupons).
CouponSystemException - Exception in exceptions
The main exception of the coupon system, which inherits from the Exception class
CouponSystemException() - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponSystemException(String, Throwable, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponSystemException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponSystemException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponSystemException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponType - Enum in beans
This Enum is being used for the coupon object, and contain the strings FOOD, ELECTRICITY, HOBBY & VACATION
create(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
Creates new company in the database (db)
create(Coupon) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
Creates new coupon in the database
create(Customer) - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
Creates new customer in the database (db)
create(Company) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
Creates new company in the database (db)
create(Coupon) - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
Creates new coupon in the database
create(Customer) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
Creates new customer in the database (db)
createCompany(Company) - Method in class facades.AdminFacade
Creates new company.
createCompany(Company, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.AdminWebService
Creates new company
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facades.CompanyFacade
Adds new coupon to the loggedIn company, after a validation that the coupon title is unique
createCoupon(Coupon, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.CompanyWebService
Creates new coupon
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facades.AdminFacade
Creates new customer.
createCustomer(Customer, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class webServices.AdminWebService
Creates new customer
createTables() - Method in class manageTables.ManageTables
 
Customer - Class in beans
This class generates the customer object, which has id, name &password
Customer() - Constructor for class beans.Customer
Empty customer CTOR
Customer(long, String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Customer
This CTOR sets the customer class fields - including the id field - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
Customer(String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Customer
This CTOR sets the customer class fields - not including the id field, that is been automatically generated in the db - to those sent when an instance of the object is created
CustomerDAO - Interface in dao
This is an interface of The system customer DAO (Data Access Objects) layer, which contains basic CRUD methods
CustomerDaoDb - Class in dao.db
This layer contains CRUD methods & additional methods for using in the facade layer, according to user needs (no business logic).
CustomerDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
 
CustomerFacade - Class in facades
With the customer facade - the layer for the business logic - the customer can purchase coupon (and remove it) and get its coupons
CustomerFacade() - Constructor for class facades.CustomerFacade
This CTOR instantiates the company & customer DaoDb layer, in order to allow access to its methods
CustomerFilter - Class in webServices.accessFilters
This filter handles a scenario when a user is trying to access the customer page, without login and receiving of a customer facade
CustomerFilter() - Constructor for class webServices.accessFilters.CustomerFilter
 
customerLoggingFilter() - Method in class webServices.accessFilters.FilterUrlConfig
Configures the customer filter for specific URL
CustomerWebService - Class in webServices
The customer web service handles the HTTP requests sent from the customer web page (client side)
CustomerWebService() - Constructor for class webServices.CustomerWebService
